A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars: The Last Jedi is one of the most disappointing movies I have seen in the last few years. The script was completely uncompelling and scattered with cringeworthy moments that unraveled any immersion Daisy Ridley was able to build. I feel embarrassed that I added to the box office numbers. Hopefully potential viewers\,  wiser than I\,  read the user reviews and ignore the inflated critic scoring of this film.
